This file contains some information about DRM/KMS.

# Determine available modes

```
cat /sys/class/drm/card0-HDMI-A-1/modes 
1366x768
1920x1080
1920x1080
1920x1080
1920x1080
1920x1080
1280x768
1280x720
1280x720
1280x720
1280x720
1280x720
1024x768
800x600
800x600
720x576
720x576
720x576
720x480
720x480
720x480
720x480
720x480
640x480
640x480
640x480
720x400
```
